presentation.title: presentation
presentation.content:
Our gourmet restaurant (1 Michelin star), located a few steps from the Bourges Cathedral, occupies a beautiful mansion of 1844, surrounded by gardens, in the military district of the nineteenth century.
It is in this environment that we will have great pleasure to welcome you. We wanted a warm, modern atmosphere. Thus, our dining room, fully glazed, offers a view of our garden. Two comfortable lounges welcome you for an aperitif or a coffee and a private lounge can also be reserved for the duration of the meal.
In fine weather, you can enjoy your meals on the terrace, in the calm of our garden.
The Circle is above all a story of friendship between two chefs, Pascal Chaupitre and Christophe Lot. A conviviality that the chefs will transmit to you to a gastronomic and inventive cuisine, full of surprises.
So, be sure that our team will always be there to ensure you have the best time possible.
